titles.title: Citizens and Legal Immigration Act
Citizens and Legal Immigration Act
To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to modify provisions relating to judicial review of orders of removal.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

bill.summary:
Citizens and Legal Immigration Act - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act (INA) to bar inadmissible arriving aliens from seeking judicial review of removal orders through habeas corpus, mandamus, or other extraordinary petitions.
Imposes a similar bar on denials of discretionary relief and orders against criminal aliens with an exception for petitions for review concerning constitutional claims or pure questions of law.
Establishes the INA's judicial review provisions as the sole avenue for challenging removal orders and reviewing claims arising under the United Nations Convention Against Torture and Other Forms of Cruel, Inhuman, or Degrading Treatment or Punishment.
